thread.title: Sania Mirza-Martina Hingis team in WTA Rogers Cup semifinals
thread.title_full: Sania Mirza-Martina Hingis team in WTA Rogers Cup semifinals | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Sania Mirza-Martina Hingis team in WTA Rogers Cup semifinals
text:
Top seeds Sania Mirza and Martina Hingis eased into the semifinals of the WTA Rogers Cup, following a straight-set win over Taipei pair of Hao-Ching Chan and Yung-Jan Chan, here.
The Indo-Swiss team beat the unseeded rivals 6-4 6-2 in the quarterfinals of the USD 2,513,000 Premier hard court tournament.
Sania Mirza and her Swiss partner Martina Hingis saved two of the three break points they faced in the match that lasted one hour and 10 minutes. Taipei team committed four doubles faults to none of the superior rivals, who broke them four times.
They will now fight it out against the fourth seeded pair of Caroline Garcia and Katarina Srebotnik for a place in the final.
 15, 2015 7:27 pm
